attributes.action: Extend 15 hours free childcare for 2 year olds to ALL families.
attributes.additional_details: The average nursery costs for a full time place for working parents in the UK is £12,107 per year. The average salary for a couple is £51,294, this means that, on average, UK couples are having to allocate 23.6% of their yearly salary to childcare alone.
attributes.background: Working parents do not get 15 hours free childcare for 2 years olds that those on benefits do get.  Working mothers and fathers need more support and help towards paying childcare fees. The tax free childcare scheme is not enough.
